innerHtml: This Quick-Time Event Detector was created in OpenCV and Tesseract OCR using Python for one of my University courses, COSC 428 (Computer Vision), during Semester 1 of 2022.

The detector is able to find quick-time events and display the action that they represent using computer vision. This is done with the use of footage from the PC version of the game ‘Detroit: Become Human’ by Quantic Dream.
Additionally, I wrote a six-page conference paper about this project, which can be found in the GitHub repository.
